title: Ok, I REALLY wanted to get to gold this season...
body:
But Riot has restricted this account from ranked play.

At some point recently, I was toxic enough to deserve a chat restriction. Not going to question that part.

But I was wondering if I'm ineligible for ranked play until the end of the season or indefinitely.

I've already completed my chat restricted games (was only 5). However I was under the impression that upon completing my chat restricted games, I would then be allowed to play ranked again.

I just want clarity on when that restriction from ranked play will be lifted, if at all.
